SUSPICIOUS ACTIVITY REPORT

Account ID: ACC_0004

PART 1: TRANSACTION DETAILS

On 2025-12-17, a debit of GBP 9,764.29 was executed via crypto. The counterparty was a debtor (id: CP_77311). Alert reason: high_risk_country

On 2025-12-31, a debit of EUR 9,303.86 was executed via card. The counterparty was a debtor (id: CP_27023).

PART 2: ACCOUNT SUMMARY
During the reporting period, total debits amounted to 33,278.27 and total credits amounted to 10,462.79. There were 7 debit transactions and 3 credit transactions. Unique creditors: 1; unique debtors: 2. Transactions observed: ACH, card, cash, crypto, wire.
